text: we need to add column leader_id to the groups table after we create the users table
cause its trying to reference a table that doesnt exist
also idk if you should add inserting default sys_details and creating the admin to the SQL
should def add the trigger creation tho

CREATE TRIGGER DeleteVersion AFTER UPDATE ON Users FOR EACH ROW UPDATE File_versions v SET v.data = NULL, v.is_current = 0 WHERE v.is_deleted = 1 and (SELECT MAX(delete_date) FROM Deletes where file_id = v.file_id and version_number = v.version_number GROUP BY file_id, version_number) < NOW() - INTERVAL 1 DAY;
